Posts.Content: Looking for information on  two procedure for treating my bone cancer,one my oncolagist sudjest  raidiotion or injection  of some kind of drug to  relived my back pain has anyone done  any of these treatments for this for back pain.?
Posts.Title: BONE TREATMENTS

Posts.Content: Yes cancer does sucks,glad that you are there for mom,true everyday does count,bless you,I have a daughter who help me and she is  my angel here on earth I also have one in heaven just waiing for me there  thank god for women and daughters.
Posts.Title: diagnoised with stage iv breast cancer metastasized to bones in spine and pelvic

Posts.Content: Me to ,Sometimes I can  be very much alone in a roomful of relatives but here its just seems more comfortable.I stared with prostate cancer twenty some years ago but one and half years  ago i was feeling pain on my elbow and went to see my doctor who after a while told me that my cancer had spread to my bones,took chemo for six treatments then was put on ivs to my my bones stronger, now I am on Xtandi capsules 40 mg .I am glad to be here with people who better understand my problems with my cancer treatments,Thanks everyone.
